participant_1.background:
I try to keep up with my family by texting them frequently and calling them on the phone.
i drive a big truck.
i am 10 years old.
I love spending time with friends who have kids of their own, because we can relate to each other and enjoy the same activities.
pizza is my favorite.

participant_2.background:
I was feeling down about my smoking habit, so I took my dog to the park and we played fetch for a while
my husband was a career soldier.
i love chocolate.
I love to visit websites about dogs and the rain.
i have bad luck with relationships.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Hi there! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I'm doing well too! Thanks for asking.
I'm glad to hear that! So, what are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out with my family. We're having pizza for dinner. What are you doing today?
I'm going to the park with my dog. We're going to play fetch and then go for a walk.
That sounds fun! I love playing fetch with my dog too. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He's the sweetest dog ever!
Golden retrievers are so cute! I love their fluffy fur.
Yeah, they are! They're also really smart and friendly.
That's great! I'm sure he's a great companion.
He is! I'm so lucky to have him.
It sounds like you have a great life! I'm glad to hear that.
